engChrName: September 7th, 9:20PM
engSearchText: September 7th, 9:20PM

engChrName: We're lucky the Direwolf and that bracer showed up when they did.
engSearchText:
We're lucky the Direwolf and that bracer showed up
when they did.
jpnChrName: ……《痩せ狼》に遊撃士が たまたま来ててラッキーだったな。
jpnSearchText:
……《痩せ狼》に遊撃士が
たまたま来ててラッキーだったな。

engChrName: No, actually, I'm not sure we can chalk that up to luck.
engSearchText:
No, actually, I'm not sure we can chalk that up
to luck.
jpnChrName: いや、むしろ必然と言うべきか。
jpnSearchText: いや、むしろ必然と言うべきか。

engChrName: Right, I don't think we can, either.
engSearchText: Right, I don't think we can, either.
jpnChrName: はい……アイーダさんたちの 軍用魔獣が異常なことになって……
jpnSearchText:
はい……アイーダさんたちの
軍用魔獣が異常なことになって……

engChrName: The bracer came to investigate the monsters' strange behavior.
engSearchText:
The bracer came to investigate the monsters'
strange behavior.
jpnChrName: その影響で元々いた狼型魔獣が おかしな動きをしていたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
その影響で元々いた狼型魔獣が
おかしな動きをしていたんですね。

engChrName: And the Direwolf had his own reasons to be here...
engSearchText: And the Direwolf had his own reasons to be here...
jpnChrName: それで遊撃士の人が来て、 ……《痩せ狼》さんの方は──
jpnSearchText:
それで遊撃士の人が来て、
……《痩せ狼》さんの方は──

engChrName: ...I'm lookin' for a wild mutt who's been let off his leash—a guy with mint green hair. Ring any bells?
engSearchText:
...I'm lookin' for a wild mutt who's been let off his
leash—a guy with mint green hair. Ring any bells?
jpnChrName: ──若造を見なかったか？ ナヨっとした、ミント髪のヤツだ。
jpnSearchText:
──若造を見なかったか？
ナヨっとした、ミント髪のヤツだ。

engChrName: I can't say I did, no. There were no other living beings in sight.
engSearchText:
I can't say I did, no. There were no other living
beings in sight.
jpnChrName: いや、僕一人だったけど…… この先は民家とかもないしね。
jpnSearchText:
いや、僕一人だったけど……
この先は民家とかもないしね。

engChrName: Didn't that man from earlier say no one was here?
engSearchText: Didn't that man from earlier say no one was here?
jpnChrName: ……あの人を追いかけて訪れ、 アイーダさんはこの丘陵から来た……
jpnSearchText:
……あの人を追いかけて訪れ、
アイーダさんはこの丘陵から来た……

engChrName: Then he was lying. If Aida came from this direction, then the Eisenschild camp must be nearby.
engSearchText:
Then he was lying. If Aida came from this direction,
then the Eisenschild camp must be nearby.
jpnChrName: だったらあの言葉はやっぱり嘘で、 野営地はこの先に……
jpnSearchText:
だったらあの言葉はやっぱり嘘で、
野営地はこの先に……

engChrName: Yeah. That guy was definitely bullshitting us.
engSearchText: Yeah. That guy was definitely bullshitting us.
jpnChrName: ああ、何者かは知らねえが 間違いなくタダ者じゃねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何者かは知らねえが
間違いなくタダ者じゃねえだろう。

engChrName: And there's no way a normal guy could get around those monsters. We barely scraped by ourselves.
engSearchText:
And there's no way a normal guy could get around
those monsters. We barely scraped by ourselves.
jpnChrName: あの軍用魔獣の異常…… 《火喰鳥》の様子も考えると。
jpnSearchText:
あの軍用魔獣の異常……
《火喰鳥》の様子も考えると。

engChrName: They kept getting up no matter how many times we knocked them down. It's like they weren't even alive.
engSearchText:
They kept getting up no matter how many times we
knocked them down. It's like they weren't even alive.
jpnChrName: ……いくら倒しても倒しきれない、 女神の息吹を感じさせない肉体……
jpnSearchText:
……いくら倒しても倒しきれない、
女神の息吹を感じさせない肉体……

engChrName: They almost reminded me of the ghouls from the stories they used to tell back home...
engSearchText:
They almost reminded me of the ghouls from the
stories they used to tell back home...
jpnChrName: まるで故郷のおとぎ話の 《屍鬼（グール）》のような──
jpnSearchText:
まるで故郷のおとぎ話の
《屍鬼（グール）》のような──

engChrName: No... That can't be what's going on here! It just can't be!
engSearchText:
No... That can't be what's going on here! It just
can't be!
jpnChrName: っ…… そんなわけないですっ……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……
そんなわけないですっ……！

engChrName: Feri...
engSearchText: Feri...
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん……
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん……

engChrName: Why now?
engSearchText: Why now?
jpnChrName: ……こんな時に………
jpnSearchText: ……こんな時に………

engChrName: It's glowing again...
engSearchText: It's glowing again...
jpnChrName: アニエスさんの ひいお祖父ちゃんの……
jpnSearchText:
アニエスさんの
ひいお祖父ちゃんの……

engChrName: That's a telltale sign that something's up.
engSearchText: That's a telltale sign that something's up.
jpnChrName: ハッ、どう絡んでるか分からんが ちょっとばかり面倒そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、どう絡んでるか分からんが
ちょっとばかり面倒そうだな。

engChrName: Feels like the higher elements are active here, too.
engSearchText: Feels like the higher elements are active here, too.
jpnChrName: この気配…… 上位属性も働いているだろう。
jpnSearchText:
この気配……
上位属性も働いているだろう。

engChrName: The camp's probably over on that plateau. Ready to move?
engSearchText:
The camp's probably over on that plateau. Ready
to move?
jpnChrName: 恐らく野営地はあの高台── ブチのめしながら登り詰めるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
恐らく野営地はあの高台──
ブチのめしながら登り詰めるぞ！

engChrName: I've never been more ready!
engSearchText: I've never been more ready!
jpnChrName: はいっ（ウーラ）……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ（ウーラ）……！

engChrName: Let's get moving, then!
engSearchText: Let's get moving, then!
jpnChrName: 行きましょう……！
jpnSearchText: 行きましょう……！

engChrName: *gasp*
engSearchText: *gasp*
jpnSearchText: ……ぁ…………

engChrName: This is awful...
engSearchText: This is awful...
jpnChrName: こ、これって……
jpnSearchText: こ、これって……

engChrName: Why, Aida? Why are you doing this?
engSearchText: Why, Aida? Why are you doing this?
jpnChrName: ……アイーダさん…… ………どうして……………
jpnSearchText:
……アイーダさん……
………どうして……………

engChrName: Those guys've got the same eyes as those hounds.
engSearchText: Those guys've got the same eyes as those hounds.
jpnChrName: ……あの犬共と同じってわけか。
jpnSearchText: ……あの犬共と同じってわけか。

engChrName: That's right. They're all lifeless shells of their former selves—dolls that act purely on instinct.
engSearchText:
That's right. They're all lifeless shells of their former
selves—dolls that act purely on instinct.
jpnChrName: ああ……命も意志もなく、 蠢き続けるだけの存在……
jpnSearchText:
ああ……命も意志もなく、
蠢き続けるだけの存在……

engChrName: Maybe it's just karma at work—divine retribution for our sins. Hard to say.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's just karma at work—divine retribution for
our sins. Hard to say.
jpnChrName: 猟兵なんてヤクザな稼業の 報いとは思いたくないが……
jpnSearchText:
猟兵なんてヤクザな稼業の
報いとは思いたくないが……
……ぁぁ…………

engChrName: Oh, Goddess... What happened ten days ago?
engSearchText: Oh, Goddess... What happened ten days ago?
jpnChrName: ……いったい…… １０日前、何があったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
……いったい……
１０日前、何があったんですか？

engChrName: Really want to know? Well, I'll tell you.
engSearchText: Really want to know? Well, I'll tell you.
jpnChrName: フフ、単純な話さ。
jpnSearchText: フフ、単純な話さ。

engChrName: The short version is...we were defeated—completely and utterly.
engSearchText:
The short version is...we were defeated—completely
and utterly.
jpnChrName: 負けちまったのさ── 完膚無きまでに、徹底的にね。
jpnSearchText:
負けちまったのさ──
完膚無きまでに、徹底的にね。
……っ！？

engChrName: And what's the long version?
engSearchText: And what's the long version?
jpnChrName: そいつは……
jpnSearchText: そいつは……

engChrName: It all began two weeks ago. We were cornered by one of the CID's Hercules units.
engSearchText:
It all began two weeks ago. We were cornered by one
of the CID's Hercules units.
jpnChrName: ──二週間前、アタシたちの部隊は ＣＩＤのハーキュリーズに捕捉された。
jpnSearchText:
──二週間前、アタシたちの部隊は
ＣＩＤのハーキュリーズに捕捉された。

engChrName: I'd heard they pick fights with jaegers in Calvard sometimes, so it wasn't too much of a shock.
engSearchText:
I'd heard they pick fights with jaegers in Calvard
sometimes, so it wasn't too much of a shock.
jpnChrName: 国内の猟兵にたまに仕掛けてくるってのは 聞いたことがあったからね。
jpnSearchText:
国内の猟兵にたまに仕掛けてくるってのは
聞いたことがあったからね。

engChrName: But in the end, we were no match for them. We found an opening in their formation and narrowly escaped.
engSearchText:
But in the end, we were no match for them.
We found an opening in their formation and
narrowly escaped.
jpnChrName: 悪くない練度だが包囲網の隙を 何とか突破してアタシたちは離脱した。
jpnSearchText:
悪くない練度だが包囲網の隙を
何とか突破してアタシたちは離脱した。

engChrName: After that, we made our way to Creil and rested at their inn. Then we set up camp here and started brainstorming ideas for how to get back home.
engSearchText:
After that, we made our way to Creil and rested at
their inn. Then we set up camp here and started
brainstorming ideas for how to get back home.
jpnChrName: 村で一泊した後、ここに野営地を築いて どのルートで帰還するか検討してた時──
jpnSearchText:
村で一泊した後、ここに野営地を築いて
どのルートで帰還するか検討してた時──

engChrName: And that's when those bastards appeared.
engSearchText: And that's when those bastards appeared.
jpnChrName: ……“アイツら”が現れたんだ。
jpnSearchText: ……“アイツら”が現れたんだ。

engChrName: We were attacked by a band of merciless savages—led by three leaders whose power was...unfathomable.
engSearchText:
We were attacked by a band of merciless savages—led
by three leaders whose power was...unfathomable.
jpnChrName: どの使い手もヤバかったが…… 中でもリーダーの３名は別格だった。
jpnSearchText:
どの使い手もヤバかったが……
中でもリーダーの３名は別格だった。

engChrName: It was a massacre. They led us to ruin like lambs to the slaughter.
engSearchText:
It was a massacre. They led us to ruin like lambs to
the slaughter.
jpnChrName: 一人、また一人仕留められて、 為す術もなく嬲り殺しにされて……
jpnSearchText:
一人、また一人仕留められて、
為す術もなく嬲り殺しにされて……

engChrName: They picked us off one by one...until no one remained.
engSearchText:
They picked us off one by one...until no
one remained.
jpnChrName: アタシたちは文字通り“全滅”した。
jpnSearchText: アタシたちは文字通り“全滅”した。

engChrName: No one...but me.
engSearchText: No one...but me.
jpnChrName: ───筈だった。
jpnSearchText: ───筈だった。

engChrName: The next thing I knew, I woke up here.
engSearchText: The next thing I knew, I woke up here.
jpnChrName: なのにふと気付いたら アタシはこの場で目を覚まして……
jpnSearchText:
なのにふと気付いたら
アタシはこの場で目を覚まして……

engChrName: When I came to, the first thing I saw was that device up there. It was emitting that ominous red light back then, too.
engSearchText:
When I came to, the first thing I saw was that device
up there. It was emitting that ominous red light back
then, too.
jpnChrName: いつの間にか、その大きな石柱の上に 赤い光を放つ装置が嵌っていた。
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか、その大きな石柱の上に
赤い光を放つ装置が嵌っていた。

engChrName: My comrades were still breathing, but they weren't exactly alive. All they could do was writhe and moan.
engSearchText:
My comrades were still breathing, but they weren't
exactly alive. All they could do was writhe
and moan.
jpnChrName: 死んだ筈の部下たちも生きていたが ただ呻いて蠢き続けるだけだった……
jpnSearchText:
死んだ筈の部下たちも生きていたが
ただ呻いて蠢き続けるだけだった……

engChrName: It was like no one had any will of their own. I was the only one who could move of their own accord...
engSearchText:
It was like no one had any will of their own. I was the
only one who could move of their own accord...
jpnChrName: アタシは何故か身動きは取れて 意識も残ってたけど……
jpnSearchText:
アタシは何故か身動きは取れて
意識も残ってたけど……

engChrName: ...except in the sunlight. I couldn't stand it anymore. And I didn't feel hunger—at least, not for a while.
engSearchText:
...except in the sunlight. I couldn't stand it anymore.
And I didn't feel hunger—at least, not for a while.
jpnChrName: どうしてか陽の光が苦しくてね。 ……しかも全然、腹が減らないんだ。
jpnSearchText:
どうしてか陽の光が苦しくてね。
……しかも全然、腹が減らないんだ。

engChrName: During the daytime, all I could do was cower in my tent and wait for night to fall.
engSearchText:
During the daytime, all I could do was cower in my
tent and wait for night to fall.
jpnChrName: 仕方なく日中はテントに身を隠して 夜、動くしかなかったな……
jpnSearchText:
仕方なく日中はテントに身を隠して
夜、動くしかなかったな……

engChrName: There was no way I could contact the rest of the corps—not in this state. Then all of a sudden, I developed a strange...craving.
engSearchText:
There was no way I could contact the rest of the
corps—not in this state. Then all of a sudden, I
developed a strange...craving.
jpnChrName: さすがに団にも連絡出来なくて…… でもそのうち“何か”が乾き始めて……
jpnSearchText:
さすがに団にも連絡出来なくて……
でもそのうち“何か”が乾き始めて……

engChrName: Our military monsters started coming back to life— and they were acting without orders.
engSearchText:
Our military monsters started coming back to life—
and they were acting without orders.
jpnChrName: 全滅した筈の軍用魔獣が 同じように蘇って勝手に動き始めて……
jpnSearchText:
全滅した筈の軍用魔獣が
同じように蘇って勝手に動き始めて……

engChrName: And my fallen comrades picked themselves off the ground... But as you can see, they aren't themselves...
engSearchText:
And my fallen comrades picked themselves off
the ground... But as you can see, they
aren't themselves...
jpnChrName: ……蠢くだけだった部下たちも 同じような兆候を見せるようになった。
jpnSearchText:
……蠢くだけだった部下たちも
同じような兆候を見せるようになった。

engChrName: I-I'm...so sorry, Aida...*sob*
engSearchText: I-I'm...so sorry, Aida...*sob*
jpnChrName: そん……な……… ……アイーダさぁん………
jpnSearchText:
そん……な………
……アイーダさぁん………

engChrName: That's horrible. Why would those people kill your men? Were they the ones responsible for turning them into...that?
engSearchText:
That's horrible. Why would those people kill
your men? Were they the ones responsible for turning
them into...that?
jpnChrName: 貴女がたを全滅させた人たちが あの装置でそんな事を……？
jpnSearchText:
貴女がたを全滅させた人たちが
あの装置でそんな事を……？

engChrName: Yeah. I think they used that device up there to do it. I tried to climb the pillar a few times to get a closer look at it...
engSearchText:
Yeah. I think they used that device up there to do it.
I tried to climb the pillar a few times to get a closer
look at it...
jpnChrName: 多分ね……何とかしようと 石柱に登ろうともしたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
多分ね……何とかしようと
石柱に登ろうともしたんだが……

engChrName: ...but my body locks up every time I try. Almost like I'm being controlled by some unseen force.
engSearchText:
...but my body locks up every time I try. Almost like
I'm being controlled by some unseen force.
jpnChrName: 身体が言うことを聞かなくてね…… まるでそう決められたかのように。
jpnSearchText:
身体が言うことを聞かなくてね……
まるでそう決められたかのように。

engChrName: I'm not gonna dance to the tune of a puppet master. That's why I'm ending it all—with my own two hands.
engSearchText:
I'm not gonna dance to the tune of a puppet master.
That's why I'm ending it all—with my own
two hands.
jpnChrName: ──だからアタシは決意した。 この手で全てのケリを付けることを。
jpnSearchText:
──だからアタシは決意した。
この手で全てのケリを付けることを。

engChrName: N-No! You can't do that!
engSearchText: N-No! You can't do that!
jpnChrName: っ…… ダメっ、アイーダさんっ……！
jpnSearchText:
っ……
ダメっ、アイーダさんっ……！

engChrName: So that's your endgame. You'd rather go out in a blaze of glory than die as a pawn in someone else's game...
engSearchText:
So that's your endgame. You'd rather go out in a
blaze of glory than die as a pawn in someone
else's game...
jpnChrName: 死ねない身体なら せめて浄化の焔にってか……？
jpnSearchText:
死ねない身体なら
せめて浄化の焔にってか……？

engChrName: You got it. The flames of purification come up all the time in ghoul-related legends, right?
engSearchText:
You got it. The flames of purification come up all the
time in ghoul-related legends, right?
jpnChrName: ああ、《屍鬼（グール）》の伝承でも定番だろう？
jpnSearchText: ああ、《屍鬼（グール）》の伝承でも定番だろう？

engChrName: So it's time for me to burn. The longer I stand here with you, the harder it gets to stave off this insatiable hunger...
engSearchText:
So it's time for me to burn. The longer I stand here
with you, the harder it gets to stave off this
insatiable hunger...
jpnChrName: ──こうして話してる間にも アタシは喉が渇いて溜まらないんだ……
jpnSearchText:
──こうして話してる間にも
アタシは喉が渇いて溜まらないんだ……

engChrName: It makes me wanna suck up every last drop of blood in your bodies. It makes me wanna feast on your flesh. Even Feri looks like a nice appetizer...
engSearchText:
It makes me wanna suck up every last drop of blood
in your bodies. It makes me wanna feast on
your flesh. Even Feri looks like a nice appetizer...
jpnChrName: アンタたちの血と肉を啜りたい…… フェリなんかプニプニ柔らかそうだしねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタたちの血と肉を啜りたい……
フェリなんかプニプニ柔らかそうだしねぇ。

engChrName: I could have that young lady as my main dish... But too bad that'd make a stringy-looking dude like you an unsavory last course.
engSearchText:
I could have that young lady as my main dish...
But too bad that'd make a stringy-looking dude like
you an unsavory last course.
jpnChrName: そっちの嬢ちゃんも滅茶苦茶ソソる…… ムサくて固そうな野郎はイマイチだけど。
jpnSearchText:
そっちの嬢ちゃんも滅茶苦茶ソソる……
ムサくて固そうな野郎はイマイチだけど。
っ……

engChrName: Damn. Low blow.
engSearchText: Damn. Low blow.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… ムサくて固そうで悪かったな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
ムサくて固そうで悪かったな。

engChrName: Stop this nonsense right now, Aida.
engSearchText: Stop this nonsense right now, Aida.
jpnChrName: ──ダメですよ、アイーダさん。
jpnSearchText: ──ダメですよ、アイーダさん。

engChrName: You aren't fooling anyone with this charade. You're still alive and in control, so we won't let you give up.
engSearchText:
You aren't fooling anyone with this charade.
You're still alive and in control, so we won't let you
give up.
jpnChrName: 諦めちゃ、ダメです。 だって貴女はちゃんと生きている。
jpnSearchText:
諦めちゃ、ダメです。
だって貴女はちゃんと生きている。

engChrName: We know you kept your distance from the villagers and tried to steer us out of harm's way—which you're still trying to do now.
engSearchText:
We know you kept your distance from the villagers
and tried to steer us out of harm's way—which you're
still trying to do now.
jpnChrName: 村の人たちを傷つけることなく、 私たちをそんな風にわざと遠ざけて……
jpnSearchText:
村の人たちを傷つけることなく、
私たちをそんな風にわざと遠ざけて……

engChrName: But why don't you consider Feri's feelings for a moment?
engSearchText:
But why don't you consider Feri's feelings for
a moment?
jpnChrName: ──でも、フェリちゃんは 貴女のためにここまで来たんです。
jpnSearchText:
──でも、フェリちゃんは
貴女のためにここまで来たんです。

engChrName: She left her home for the first time in her life— charging into a world unknown to her—and tracked Van down. All so she could find you.
engSearchText:
She left her home for the first time in her life—
charging into a world unknown to her—and tracked
Van down. All so she could find you.

engChrName: I'll be back in a flash—with a cat in tow!
engSearchText: I'll be back in a flash—with a cat in tow!
jpnChrName: ここはわたしが、ササッと行って パパッと確保しちゃいますっ！
jpnSearchText:
ここはわたしが、ササッと行って
パパッと確保しちゃいますっ！

engChrName: No complaints here. We'll leave it to you.
engSearchText: No complaints here. We'll leave it to you.
jpnChrName: ハッ、なら任せたぜ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、なら任せたぜ。

engChrName: If anything, it'll be good to have two of us down here should the worst come to pass.
engSearchText:
If anything, it'll be good to have two of us down here
should the worst come to pass.
jpnChrName: では私たちは万が一に備えて、 下でフォローしますね。
jpnSearchText:
では私たちは万が一に備えて、
下でフォローしますね。

engChrName: Climbing this will be a breeze!
engSearchText: Climbing this will be a breeze!
jpnChrName: この高さなら簡単に登れそうですね！
jpnSearchText: この高さなら簡単に登れそうですね！

engChrName: Meow?!
engSearchText: Meow?!
jpnChrName: フニャア！？
jpnSearchText: フニャア！？

engChrName: There, there. Hope I didn't startle you, little buddy. You're not injured, are you?
engSearchText:
There, there. Hope I didn't startle you, little buddy.
You're not injured, are you?
jpnChrName: っと……驚かせちゃってごめんね。 怪我はしてないかな？
jpnSearchText:
っと……驚かせちゃってごめんね。
怪我はしてないかな？

engChrName: M-Meow...
engSearchText: M-Meow...
jpnChrName: ニ、ニャア……
jpnSearchText: ニ、ニャア……

engChrName: Meoooww. ♪
engSearchText: Meoooww. ♪
jpnChrName: フニャン……ゴロゴロ……♪
jpnSearchText: フニャン……ゴロゴロ……♪

engChrName: Phew! Glad to hear it. You've calmed down a bunch, too, haven't you? Good kitty!
engSearchText:
Phew! Glad to hear it. You've calmed down a bunch,
too, haven't you? Good kitty!
jpnChrName: ふぅ、よかったぁ…… 今度は落ち着いてくれたみたいだねっ！
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、よかったぁ……
今度は落ち着いてくれたみたいだねっ！

engChrName: Is everything all right up there, Feri?
engSearchText: Is everything all right up there, Feri?
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、そちらは大丈夫でしたか？
jpnSearchText: フェリちゃん、そちらは大丈夫でしたか？

engChrName: Yep, the kitty's safe now!
engSearchText: Yep, the kitty's safe now!
jpnChrName: はい、無事に確保する事ができました！
jpnSearchText: はい、無事に確保する事ができました！

engChrName: The cute little thing's actually behaving himself this time.
engSearchText:
The cute little thing's actually behaving himself
this time.
jpnChrName: 理由は分かりませんけど、 今はすっかり大人しくなってますよ。
jpnSearchText:
理由は分かりませんけど、
今はすっかり大人しくなってますよ。

engChrName: Glad to hear it because that 'cute little thing' sure gave us a lot of grief...
engSearchText:
Glad to hear it because that 'cute little thing' sure
gave us a lot of grief...
jpnChrName: そうか……ったく、世話が焼ける猫だぜ。
jpnSearchText: そうか……ったく、世話が焼ける猫だぜ。

engChrName: We should head back to the village, then.
engSearchText: We should head back to the village, then.
jpnChrName: それじゃあクレイユ村に戻りましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあクレイユ村に戻りましょうか。

engChrName: Lashkar and Annie must be worried sick.
engSearchText: Lashkar and Annie must be worried sick.
jpnChrName: ラシュカル君もアニーちゃん達も 待っていますから。
jpnSearchText:
ラシュカル君もアニーちゃん達も
待っていますから。
